mapper.sql: id, name, organization, start_time, end_time, status, create_time
mapper.select:
select
,
from t_dispatch_alive
where name like "%" #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR} "%"
mapper.insert: insert into t_dispatch_alive (id, name, organization, start_time, end_time, status, create_time, devices) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{organization,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{devices,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

insert into t_dispatch_alive
id,
name,
organization,
start_time,
end_time,
status,
create_time,
devices,

mapper.update:
update t_dispatch_alive
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
organization = #{organization,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
devices = #{devices,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update t_dispatch_alive set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, organization = #{organization,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, devices = #{devices,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
